summary: This code snippet describes a collection of small ISOs for RDP and console emulation. It mentions using VirtualBox without Docker due to issues faced, and provides links to relevant resources. The text highlights various problems such as storage, network, persistence, and visual issues, among others, indicating the challenges encountered in this process.

details.content:
damn small iso collection for rdp and console emulation 
https://codegolf.stackexchange.com/questions/4732/emulate-an-intel-8086-cpu
so it is easier to do this without the help of docker, which always have issue with us.
https://www.nakivo.com/blog/how-to-install-virtualbox-extension-pack/#:~:text=Open%20Launchpad%2C%20run%20VirtualBox%2C%20then%20go%20to%20Tools,from%20the%20VirtualBox%20site%20%28Oracle_VM_VirtualBox_Extension_Pack-6.0.8.vbox-extpack%20in%20this%20case%29.
https://cloudbase.it/freerdp-for-windows-nightly-builds/
https://www.gryphel.com/c/minivmac/
floppy disk problem. iso problem. vbox com problem.
cpu problem. ram problem. network problem.
storage problem. persistance problem. telnet/ctty problem.
visual problem. input problem. comprehension problem.
ethical problem. identity problem. maintainence problem.
